name: Renegade (itch) (Jack Vine)
description:
A 3D top-down (from the front a bit) dungeon crawler / shooter.

IT IS THE FUTURE!! :O You are a robot tasked with taking down the controlling corporation in this Utopian city...or something...

The game fully supports both keyboard/mouse input and controller.

PLEASE NOTE: The game is still very much in-development and as such, is missing a lot of content. More content will be added in the lead up to an alpha release.
